New Records: Rohit Sharma broke Sachin Tendulkar's record for the most World Cup centuries, becoming the leading century-maker in World Cup history.
Rohit Sharma broke Kapil Dev's record for the fastest hundred by an Indian batter in World Cups, reaching his century off 63 balls.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 131 off 84 balls to lead India to an 8-wicket victory.
Ishan Kishan scored 47 runs but was dismissed by Rashid Khan.
Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 39 runs in 10 overs.
India won the match by 8 wickets with 15 overs to spare.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's win improved their net run rate and set up their next match against Pakistan.
Others: Naveen-ul-Haq, despite being booed, was the pick of the Afghanistan bowlers.
